project.findByName: SELECT a.id, a.name FROM ${sql/tables/table[@name='a']} a JOIN types t ON a.type_id=t.id WHERE t.id=(SELECT id FROM types WHERE name='project') AND a.name=?;
project.findAll: select id, name from activities WHERE type_id = (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name='project');
project.save: INSERT INTO activities VALUES (null, (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name='project'), ?)
project.update: UPDATE activities SET name=? WHERE id=?;

stage.findByName: SELECT a.id, a.name FROM activities a JOIN types t ON a.type_id=t.id WHERE t.id=(SELECT id FROM types WHERE name='stage') AND a.name=?;
stage.findByProjectName: SELECT a.id, a.name FROM activities a JOIN activities_associations aa ON aa.sub_activity_id = a.id WHERE aa.sub_activity_id IN (SELECT ac.id FROM activities ac WHERE ac.type_id = (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name='stage')) AND aa.activity_id=(SELECT id FROM activities WHERE name=?);
stage.findAll: select id, name from activities WHERE type_id = (SELECT id FROM types WHERE name='stage');

story.findByName: SELECT a.id, a.name FROM activities a JOIN types t ON a.type_id=t.id WHERE t.id=(SELECT id FROM types WHERE name='story') AND a.name=?;
